entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Annapolis Royal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 1:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 6 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Risk of thundershowers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets late this evening then to snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
